abstract: New York City Planning Commission declines to force developer Acuity Capital Partners to include affordable housing units in its plans for boutique condominium on West 18th Street.
lead_paragraph: The projects, approved by the City Planning Commission, serve as important tests for the de Blasio administration’s efforts to blunt gentrification.
snippet: The projects, approved by the City Planning Commission, serve as important tests for the de Blasio administration’s efforts to blunt gentrification....

headline.main: Affordable Housing Rules Apply to Bronx Complex, but Not One in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Panel Applies Affordable Housing Rules to Bronx Development, but Not One in Manhattan
